meanings.definition: Excessively fussy or prim in behavior or appearance.
meanings.sent1: She always dresses in a prissier manner than her friends.
meanings.sent2: The cat groomed itself in a prissier way than usual.
meanings.sent3: The prissier penguin refused to swim in the slightly dirty water.
meanings.sent4: Her room was so clean, it looked prissier than a royal palace.
meanings.sent5: The doll's prissier outfit made it stand out among the others.

meanings.definition: Showing excessive concern with trivial details or propriety.
meanings.sent1: His prissier attitude towards grammar annoyed his classmates.
meanings.sent2: The prissier lady spent hours arranging her bookshelf alphabetically.
meanings.sent3: The prissier chef insisted on using only organic, hand-picked ingredients.
meanings.sent4: Her prissier approach to etiquette made her the talk of the town.
meanings.sent5: The prissier decorations at the party were meticulously placed.
